title: American from California seeking legit ashram
selftext:
Hey r/india, I’m looking for an ashram in India to stay at for two weeks while in traveling in your country. 

I do a lot of meditation. Just seeking a daily schedule at an ashram for maybe two weeks that I can stay at while I’m in India traveling around. 

Found one in Rishikesh that looks legit but from what I’ve read here it doesn’t exist they’re all a scam..? 

This is what I’ve found: https://www.sadhakagrama.org/daily-ashram-schedule/

Any recommendations for places to learn more about meditation and yoga and live a more religious / spiritual experience at an ashram? 

Thanks so much <3
comments: Vast Majority of them are scams , go there only if someone who you know & has been there recommends it to you, or else stay away.
How about using that money and trying to actually help someone for real? Most of these ashrams are very sketchy places, but it's your money, your choice.
Does it have to be India? There's a Hindu monastery in Kauai - gives you complete Ashram experience. Plus the weather is India - like, minus the smog and honking.
